effects.effect: Choose one of the following abilities.

features.name: Death Rattle
features.flavor: You unleash an otherworldly cry that rips through your enemies, killing the weakest of them.

effects.effect:
###### Deluge (11 Ferocity)

*You summon your primordial storm.*
| **Area, Magic, Ranged** |               **Main action** |
| ----------------------- | ----------------------------: |
| **üìè 5 cube within 10** | **üéØ Each enemy in the area** |
effects.tier1: 4 psychic damage; any target who is a minion is reduced to 0 Stamina
effects.tier2: 6 psychic damage; any target who is a minion is reduced to 0 Stamina, as does one winded target who is not a leader or solo creature
effects.tier3: 10 psychic damage; each target who is not a leader or solo creature is winded; any target who is a minion is reduced to 0 Stamina, as does one winded target who is not a leader or solo creature

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: This ability deals your primordial damage type and ignores damage immunity.
